title: Homedepot Scraper
description: Homedepot Scraper is a web scraper designed to extract information from homedepot.com products such as price, code, variations, availability, images and much more. You can use it with keywords, categories urls and by targeting specific products urls.

categoryUrls.title: Category URLs
categoryUrls.description: One or more category url(s) to extract products from.
categoryUrls.sectionDescription: Sets the input options for scraping products.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: One or more keywords to extract products based on it.

productUrls.title: Product URLs
productUrls.description: One or more product urls to extract information from.

startPage.title: Start Page
startPage.description: First result page from which to start extracting products, works with categories and keywords.
startPage.sectionDescription: Options to control the pagination of the results.

lastPage.title: Last Page
lastPage.description: Last result page from which to end extracting products, works with categories and keywords.

allPages.title: Scrape all pages
allPages.description: Set to on to scrape all the result pages

minPrice.title: Minimun Price
minPrice.description: Minimun price of the scraped products.
minPrice.sectionDescription: Set options for segmentation of the products.

maxPrice.title: Maximun Price
maxPrice.description: Maximun price of the scraped products.
